contents.content: Use the Astronomical Image Coloring Tool to look at different objects and their available filters. Once you have decided what image you want to work with and what question you want to answer using this image, answer the questions below.

To make an image:

  • For each of the filters you wish to use, start by turning on each filter and assigning colors.
  • Adjust the sliders to enhance the image. Think about color-balancing the image so it clearly shows the areas or objects you wish to study.
